name: DescribeLayoutItem

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the label text for this item.

methods.name: getLayoutComponents
methods.description: Returns a list of QuickAction.DescribeLayoutComponents for this item.

methods.name: isEditableForNew
methods.description: Indicates whether this item can be edited for new (true) or not (false).

methods.name: isEditableForUpdate
methods.description: Indicates whether this item can be edited for update(true) or not (false).

methods.name: isPlaceholder
methods.description: Indicates whether this item is a placeholder (true) or not (false). If true, then this item is blank.

methods.name: isRequired
methods.description: Indicates whether this item is required (true) or not (false).

description: Represents an individual item in a QuickAction.DescribeLayoutRow.
